attributes.action: No Confidence Vote in Gordon Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do you lack confidence in our unelected Prime Minister. Lets be allowed to vote on the issue.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government, and should start with a verb, and not a name or statement. Alternatively, you may wish to sign this petition: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/please-go/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
